explanation: Funds are required to provide enhanced maritime intelligence communications capability in a COCOM. This is a MIP project. This is an OCO budget requirement.
Funds are. required for intelligence collection and targeting support for a COCOM. This is a: MIP project. This is an OCO budget requirement.

Funds are available for transfer under section 9018 of the DoD Appropriations Act, 2020, provided additional funds to improve the intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance capabilities of the DoD. This is Title DX OCO budget funding.
